response.original_title: Gumshoe's Bizarre Adventure: Edge of Despair
response.overview: It is a period of civil war. The Remnants of Despair, striking from a hidden base, have won their first victory against the benevolent Gumshoe Alliance.  Gumshoe and the gang, joined by new allies from Fódlan, managed to steal into the Organization’s lair, unknowingly setting in motion the plans to bring about ultimate despair.  Pursued by Monokuma’s sinister agents, Prince Dimitri and his fellow classmates find themselves locked in a deadly killing game, custodian of the hope that can save Garreg Mach and restore freedom to the multiverse…
response.tagline: Gumshoe's Adventure is about to get a whole lot more bizarre...
response.title: Gumshoe's Bizarre Adventure: Edge of Despair
